item.title: 我的第一个博客
item.description: Hugo\myblog>cd content/ D:\Hugo\myblog\content>cd post/ D:\Hugo\myblog\content\post>cd.. D:\Hugo\myblog\content>cd.. D:\Hugo\myblog>hugo new post/blog.md Error: D:\Hugo\myblog\content\post\blog.md already exists D:\Hugo\myblog>
